addTemplate(address).details: allows to register a template by paying a fee

params._template: address of template to be added

launchTemplate(uint256,bytes,string,addr.details: function to launch a template on Aqua, called from AquaFactory

removeTemplate(uint256).details: allows the templateManager to unregister a template

updateTemplateMetadataContentHash(addres.details: allows the template deployer to update the template metadataContentHash

verifyTemplate(uint256).details: allows the templateManager to verify a template
